title: Are You the One? El Match Perfecto
overview: The ultimate test of love, trust, and teamwork arrives on UNIMÁSas the hit reality series Are You the One? El Match Perfecto premieres Monday, August 25 at 8 p.m. ET/ 7 p.m. CT. Hosted by acclaimed actor and television personality Vadhir Derbez("Gossip Girl: Acapulco," "Mira Quién Baila," "La Familia P. Luche," "¿Quién es la Máscara?"), the series takes place in the stunning tropical paradise of Trancoso, Brazil, where 24 singles are thrown together with one bold mission: find their perfect match.Through a combination of heart-pounding challenges and emotional revelations, each contestant must identify their one true match from within the group. But there's a twist: the only way to win the $200,000 jackpot is for everyone to succeed. If even one match is wrong, the entire group walks away with nothing. With "everyone wins, or no one does" as its driving mantra, "Are You the One? El Match Perfecto" raises the stakes for love and money like never before.
